articles.title: Would the Patriots’ dynasty have ever happened without new Hall of Famer Adam Vinatieri?
articles.description:
Vinatieri won three Super Bowls with the Patriots and a fourth with the Colts. While he may have played more seasons in Indianapolis, he is an ultimate Patriot.

articles.title: Patriots-Seahawks Super Bowl will likely come down to which quarterback makes the fewest mistakes
articles.description:
